Question: Which statements are true regarding the relationship between 'Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.' and 'Lage Raho Munna Bhai'?
Options:
A. Lage Raho Munna Bhai is a sequel to Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
B. Both films are part of the Munna Bhai film series.
C. Munna Bhai M.B.B.S. is a standalone film unrelated to Lage Raho Munna Bhai.
D. Lage Raho Munna Bhai continues the story from Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
Answer: A) Lage Raho Munna Bhai is a sequel to Munna Bhai M.B.B.S., B) Both films are part of the Munna Bhai film series., D) Lage Raho Munna Bhai continues the story from Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
